Aim: Rename/save copies of old files

```{R}
#
# Set-up ----
#

# Import libraries
library(RPostgres) # database
library(tidyverse) # includes



#
# Connect to database----
#

con = dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(),
                dbname='oshpd_postgres', 
                host="localhost", port=5433,
                user='postgres',
                password='')
dbListTables(con)
```

Copy Tables

```{R}
# dbExecute(con, "CREATE TABLE pdd_peds_2019_03 AS TABLE pdd_peds")
# dbExecute(con, "CREATE TABLE edd_peds_2019_03 AS TABLE edd_peds")
dbExecute(con, "CREATE TABLE combined_peds_2019_03 AS TABLE combined_peds")
```


```{R}
dbListTables(con)
```

Drop Tables

```{R}
dbExecute(con, "DROP TABLE pdd_peds")
dbExecute(con, "DROP TABLE edd_peds")
dbExecute(con, "DROP TABLE combined_peds")
```


```{R}
dbListTables(con)
```
